name: KEEP OUT
summary:
KEEP OUT is a horror / mystery puzzle adventure game.
The story takes place at Devota Hill in 2044, where players become the wise and loving monarch of a sentient AI toy named  “Mr. M” who embarks on an adventure to unlock the secrets of Devota Hill and Humes Science, a facility where Mr. M was created.

Play the demo here:
https://weaveractive.itch.io/keep-out
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: horror / mystery puzzle adventure
  • 游玩人数: Singleplayer
  • 官方网站: https://www.weaverint.com/
  • itch.io: https://weaveractive.itch.io/keep-out
  • itch.io: https://weaveractive.itch.io/keep-out-brand-new-demo
